articles.description: Zomato’s users can now build carts from up to four restaurants and eventually order from the eatery of their choice. Further, after checking out one cart, users can come back and complete orders from the remaining carts as well.
articles.content: At a time when food delivery has slowed down and the two major players look to make incremental market share gains, Zomato now lets users build multiple carts at the same time. With this, the Gurugra… [+2793 chars]
